name: Disney's Animated Storybook: The Lion King
name_original: Disney's Animated Storybook: The Lion King
description: Disney's Animated Storybook: The Lion King is the first entry in the Disney's Animated Storybook point-and-click adventure interactive storybook PC game series, based on theatrical and home video releases. The game is based on the 1994 Walt Disney Feature Animation film, The Lion King, which tells the story of how a lion named Simba rose to become king of the Pride Lands, claiming the role from his evil uncle Scar, who manipulated Simba into thinking that he killed his father (and Scar's brother) Mufasa.
